com.ontotext.russie.morph

Class MorphologyReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ontotext.russie.morph.MorphologyReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RussIEConstants

    public class MorphologyReader
extends Object
implements RussIEConstants
    This class reads in the morphology with the word forms and creates lists of Lemmas that present wordforms and varios other morhological and syntactic information for them. It needs the path to the morphology to be set before load-time, otherwise the default is used form RussIEConstants.

    Title: RussIE

    Description: Russian Information Extraction based on GATE

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2003

    Company: Ontotext Lab.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    borislav popov
